title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: My father is giving me $250K to buy a home, but told me not to tell my two siblings. Am I morally obligated to tell them?
items.description: “I don’t want to jeopardize my father’s kind offer.”

items.title: My boyfriend owns a house and earns more than me, but I refuse to marry him without a prenup. Is that wise?
items.description: “I recently learned about land that has been in my family for 150 years.”
